summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling its relevant resolutions, in particular resolution 1615 (2005) of 29 July 2005,
Noting the upcoming meeting of the Group of Friends of the Secretary-General on Georgia in Geneva on 2 and 3 February 2006,
 Decides to extend the mandate of the United Nations Observer Mission in Georgia (UNOMIG) until 31 March 2006;
 Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
